Objects.Name: white glove
Objects.Description: There is a small white glove on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This white glove looks rather like its worth no protection what-so-ever.

Objects.Name: crystal shard
Objects.Description: There is a tiny piece of broken crystal on the ground.

Objects.Name: book dragons
Objects.Description: There is a book here with a scaled cover.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This book has so much information about dragons it would take you weeks todecide what you wanted to read...

Objects.Name: robe liche
Objects.Description: A partly rotted robe lies in the corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This robe looks like it once belonged to something dead.  Maybe you shouldn'tkeep it.

Objects.Name: epee
Objects.Description: A nice looking epee lies here, begging to be picked up.

Objects.Name: powwee
Objects.Description: There is a strange blue spiraled fruit on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This fruit tastes something like apples with peanut better spread on.

Objects.Name: war ribbon
Objects.Description: There is a coiled up piece of ribbon here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This weapon is certainly one of the more exotic you've seen: a coiled uppiece of incredibly sharp metal used to coil around an opponent's limb and ripoff as much flesh as possible.

Objects.Name: zucchini
Objects.Description: A pale, light green zucchini.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks rather sickly, as if it didn't get enough sun.

Objects.Name: manual protection
Objects.Description: There is a thin manual with big red letters here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: As you read the manual, you begin to realize that its better NOT to get hitduring a fight...

Objects.Name: brochure
Objects.Description: There is a travel brochure here, inviting you to see the sights.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Hey you know, now that you think of it, there's a lot of places you haven'tbeen...  This is the perfect opportunity!

Objects.Name: bird perch plate
Objects.Description: There is some sort of bird perch here, attached to something metal.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a bird perch made to affix to the shoulder plate of some armor.  Youdon't have a clue why.

Objects.Name: arbalest
Objects.Description: There is an arbalest here, nearly as tall as you!

Objects.Name: target armor
Objects.Description: There is a light set of armor here, with a big bulls-eye painted onthe front...

Objects.Name: quick sheathe
Objects.Description: There is a nice-looking break-away sheathe discarded here.

Objects.Name: tin can worms nightcrawlers
Objects.Description: There is a tin can of worms lying here.

Objects.Name: amulet
Objects.Description: There is a valuble amulet inscribed with Rumble's symbol here.

Objects.Name: eagle pendant
Objects.Description: There is a pendant in the shape of an eagle here.

Objects.Name: fly lure
Objects.Description: There is a small fishing lure here.

Objects.Name: dusk basil
Objects.Description: You see a small dusk of an herb here.

Objects.Name: fern seed
Objects.Description: You see a very tiny seed here.

Objects.Name: clump hemlock
Objects.Description: There is a clump of hemlock lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: leaf betony
Objects.Description: A small bright green leaf lies on the ground.

Objects.Name: crown elder berries
Objects.Description: A ring of red berries lies here.

Objects.Name: guild key
Objects.Description: There is a small green key on the floor.

Objects.Name: blank key
Objects.Description: There is a blank key here.

Objects.Name: odd scroll
Objects.Description: There is an odd-looking scroll here.

Objects.Name: jailer's key
Objects.Description: There is a jailer's key here.

Objects.Name: flaming sword
Objects.Description: There is a sword here with a blade of red.

Objects.Name: dreamblade blade
Objects.Description: A sword lies here with a shifting blade that hurts your eyes.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The inscription on the pommel reads, 'Strike True'

Objects.Name: chimaera cloak
Objects.Description: You spot a cloak out of the corner of your eye.

Objects.Name: jerkin
Objects.Description: There is a nice looking shirt here.

Objects.Name: space warp wand space-warp
Objects.Description: A wand might be here.

Objects.Name: elite sword
Objects.Description: A beautiful sword has been discarded here.

Objects.Name: amulet protection
Objects.Description: An amulet is here, not wanted by anybody.

Objects.Name: staff memory
Objects.Description: A staff stands against the wall here.

Objects.Name: flail
Objects.Description: A sharp-looking flail is here.

Objects.Name: painting
Objects.Description: A painting of the goddess of healing hangs here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a painting of Arla, goddess of healing.  There seems to be noartist's signiture, however.

Objects.Name: axe
Objects.Description: A big axe is here.

Objects.Name: talisman hope
Objects.Description: A talisman lies here, filleted in gold.

Objects.Name: armor living blob
Objects.Description: A blob of something that pulses slightly is lumped here.
Objects.WearFlags: Take, Neck, Body, Legs, Feet, Arms, Waist, Wrist
Objects.ExtraDescription: It seems to be rather cohesive, and feels dry to the touch.It grips your finger firmly as you poke it.  You wonder WHOwould want such a thing.

Objects.Name: apple
Objects.Description: An extremely pale apple sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks like it didn't get enough sun.

Objects.Name: potato potatoe
Objects.Description: A potato sits here, eyeing you.

Objects.Name: onion
Objects.Description: You can smell that onion from here!

Objects.Name: plate breast
Objects.Description: A steel breast plate lies here.

Objects.Name: cap steel round
Objects.Description: A round, steel cap lies here, discarded.

Objects.Name: leggings chain
Objects.Description: A pair of chain leggings are piled here.

Objects.Name: chest
Objects.Description: An ornate looking chest sits here.

Objects.Name: water well water
Objects.Description: A well sits in the center of the intersection here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It goes deep, deep, deep into the ground.  There's a grate overtop to keeppeople from throwing trash down inside it.

Objects.Name: beer bottle beer
Objects.Description: A bottle with a brightly colored label sits here.

Objects.Name: wine carafe wine
Objects.Description: A wooden carafe sits on a table here.

Objects.Name: firebreather shotglass glass firebreather
Objects.Description: A shotglass has been discarded here.
